column4: dze kɛma ewuraba a wɔasan mu eyi no nye ne mba a modɔ hɔn nokwar mu no; na nnyɛ mo nko
column5: na hɔn a wonyim nokwar no nyina so;"

column2: "osian nokwar no a ɔtse hɛn mu
column3: na ɔnye hɛn bɛtsena daa no ntsi."

column4: na asomdwee mfi Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest
column5: Egya no ne Ba no hɔ
column6: mbra hɛn do wɔ nokwar nye ɔdɔ mu."

column3: dɛ mehu wo mba dɛ wɔnam nokwar mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ yeenya ahyɛdze wɔ Egya no hɔ no."

column5: nnyɛ dɛ merekyerɛw wo ahyɛdze fofor
column6: na mbom dza ofi ahyɛse no yenyae no

column3: dɛ yɛbɛnantsew dɛ mbrɛ n’ahyɛdze no tse. Iyi nye ahyɛdze no dɛ
column4: mbrɛ hom fi ahyɛse tsee no

column3: hɔn a wɔmmpaa mu nnka dɛ Jesus Kraest aba wɔ honam mu no. Iyinom nye ɔdaadaafo nye antikraest no."
na yaannyew dza yɛayɛ edwuma enya no
column4: na mbom yeenya akatua a odzi mu wɔ mu."

column2: "Obiara a ɔnntsena Kraest nkyerɛkyerɛ mu na ɔfom wɔ ndzeyɛɛ mu no
column3: onnyi Nyankopɔn: nyia ɔtse Kraest nkyerɛkyerɛ mu no
column4: ɔno na ɔwɔ Egya no nye Ɔba no."

column2: "Sɛ obi ba hom nkyɛn na onnsuo nkyerɛkyerɛ yi mu a
column3: mma hom nngye no nnkɔ hom fie
ɔyɛ ne ndzeyɛbɔn no ne fafafo."

column2: "Mowɔ ndzɛmba pii a nkyɛ ɔwɔ dɛ mekyerɛw brɛ hom dze
column3: naaso memmpɛ dɛ medze krataa nye dubir mekyerɛw. M’enyi da kwan dɛ mebɛba hom nkyɛn
column4: na yɛahwɛ hɛnho enyim na enyim akasa ama hɛn dɛw aahyɛ ma."

column2: "Wo nuabaa a wɔasan mu eyi no ne mba no kyia wo."
